name: MetaWar Token
description: Role play shooting game with collectible weapons that will be equipped by players, also upgrade levels to complete mission and earn NFT & Tokens. Its not only a multiple war game, but also a sustainbale ecosystem with story mode. The contract has 2% hardcoded tax and its not changeable. There is no any extra rights for the owner as well. The smart contract is standard if we exclude the hardcoded tax.
